name: Girlish Grimoire Littlewitch Romanesque: Editio Perfecta
summary:
In Girlish Grimoire Littlewitch Romanesque you are a teacher of the magical arts with the task of training two girls to become first-class wizards. This is the "Editio Perfecta" (perfect edition) of the game, which includes all additional game scenarios from the game's fandisc plus one all-new game route created for this edition. The adult-only game will be available for the first time outside of Japan, for Windows PC. 
 
You play as Domino, the youngest wizard ever to earn the rank of Archmage. You must manage your pupils' schedule, teach them essential spells, increase their magical power and send them on quests to test their progress. Your time is limited, so use it wisely.
